mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, sb.board_num as boardNum, sb.*, (case when sl.board_num is not null then 1 else 0 end ) as liked, sf.real_name from sns_board sb left join sns_like sl on (sb.board_num = sl.board_num and sb.member_id = sl.member_id) left join sns_file sf on (sb.board_num = sf.board_num) where 1 = 1 and sb.member_id = 7800 order by sb.board_num desc
